channel.title: Res Issue
channel.description:
I smell foul play. Im 100% sure I renewed my rez in W1 two weeks ago with the command /res lease renew.
I only bring it up cause I log off for 1/2 an hour and The hybrids loot every chest I have and led all my live stock out. To do this they would have to have many players or trips to help as I had alot of chests that were full. This would have had to start the second I logged off with my rez intact. Is there a way that the rez could be modified or tampered with or an addon that could break it? Im more worried that they can break rez's now then I care about my loot.

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:15, topic:446469”]Yep, well, enjoy the demote/ban/and award removal. He rolled back hybrids house ingame, banned me and others, then quit.

Idiot.

Moparisthebest, he’s rolled back the_hybrids house completely so we need you to come on and restore the map, unless there is another way of doing it?[/quote]He also messed up dome city with had other’s houses in it. So I’m also requesting a rollback.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yep, well, enjoy the demote/ban/and award removal. He rolled back hybrids house ingame, banned me and others, then quit.

Idiot.

Moparisthebest, he’s rolled back the_hybrids house completely so we need you to come on and restore the map, unless there is another way of doing it?

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

Ahh it all becomes clear now.
They are your friends? Rules then dont apply really.
They broke two main rules and got no ban.
Tell me again what AGL did and how long his ban is?

Even a king must obey his own decrees or revolts happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Because he thinks that Tarkoffs out to get him, and will ban him if he knows, he has my explicit permission to be here. He’s scared that the argument “oh and he’s vain” will be thrown into it all.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Then why doesn’t he seem to want anyone to know, and say he can still be banned for it?

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yes, we know he is Vain, he was allowed to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

What if this hybrid guy is really i_vain_i, was he banned or something in the past? I really can’t remember, but while upgrading xauth, I saw this on the console (look at the /r commands, they are PMs of course)

1:09:04 [INFO] [2] touch the cow 21:09:06 [INFO] [2] stand here 21:09:07 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] the_hybrid: /msg jrubrkletern stop saying vain pls 21:09:09 [INFO] [2] when u want them to spawn 21:09:10 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] jrubrkletern: /r y 21:09:13 [INFO] [2] take this spider 21:09:16 [INFO] [2] omce 21:09:17 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] the_hybrid: /r some people dont know 21:09:21 [INFO] [1] hybrid 21:09:21 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] jrubrkletern: /r so 21:09:25 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] jrubrkletern: /r u dont want them to know? 21:09:25 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] the_hybrid: /r like tarkoff..last night.. 21:09:27 [INFO] [1] ur stuck in there now >list 21:09:32 [INFO] There are 5 out of maximum 50 players online. 21:09:32 [INFO] Connected players:ImReziah, jrubrkletern, Reni, the_hybrid, zaz278 21:09:32 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] the_hybrid: /r i kan still be banned for it.. 21:09:33 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] jrubrkletern: /r its not like tarkoff knew who u were b4 21:09:36 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] jrubrkletern: /r o 21:09:41 [INFO] [1] :3 21:09:42 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] jrubrkletern: /r shoulda told me earlier

Looks like he at least THINKS he can be banned for being i_vain_i (I assume that name from the ‘vain’).

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Did you check to see when it expired after you issued the renew command? And were you inside your res when you issued it, I think you might have to be?

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I very strongly disagree.

You have a choice here.
Punish players that have broken rules blatantly or let them piss on the rules?

as I said before, I would have dished out the same punishment if they have done the same to any other player.

On the eve of advertising for new players should you not want to follow to the rules to the letter? by not doing this you will now have to deal with way more garbage reports and people bitching. It should be as simple as (Rules broken= punishment )
By not banning them you send out a message that the rules are not real rules and they can do whatever they want.
As you said “I want to encourage a better community” and I don’t think players that do this kind of activity promote this type of play.

And yes I will wage a war with them, as a player that is how I play. Do bad to me I will fight back 10 fold. This will not end well.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Nobody said that rules weren’t broken, I simply said that the extent of those rules which were broken weren’t enough to constitute to a 2 week ban. 2 weeks isn’t a short ban at all, you can see that if you go into the infractions report section.

Point #3 is incorrect, you really can’t hide behind that on this matter. I don’t know if you’ve realized but we’re not exactly the most popular server in town, I want to encourage a better community and you’re banning them for unrealistic amounts of time, and then waging a drama entailed war on them.

I know you think “waging war” makes you look tough and teaches them a lesson, but it really doesn’t, all you’re really doing is inflaming the situation and making my inbox bigger when people complain about it. The_Hybrid has stolen unreal amounts of stuff from my bases all around world one, I’ve not even bothered him about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I do not agree
comes down to this. Rules were broken. its a black and white matter.
The ban should stay if not be longer.
1: They greifed all my piston doors, not just the stone but all the pistons and red stone as well. Only after the ban was n the table did they offer to repair any damage.
2: They Killed or removed all my live stock.
3: They did this to a staff member, some one who is there to help them and deal with their bullshit. Even if my rez was to expire they could have warned me, instead the took EVERY item in every chest and stripped them bare. Not even my bones were left.

What type of message does this send that players can blatantly abuse rules in place with no repercussion. A two week ban is very small I don’t see how that was excessive. They clearly knew the rules as the first thing they did was shout them back at me.

Not only that, but the WAR the will now in sue will be nothing but bitching from them as I will not back down. Every moment spent in the game I will hunt them as they have now proven to be “capable” players that want a war.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Nobody can be 100% sure without having the logs checked first

I understand you feel a little cheated in losing your stuff, but you have to accept that sometimes stuff doesn’t always go to plan whether the mistake was made on your end or not. The bottom line is this: We can’t ban people without proper investigation for bug abuse. I know you’ve said that the current ban isn’t for the potential bug abuse, but for the rules they have broken, now I’m going to be honest when I say this but you and I both know they haven’t broken sufficient amount of rules to be banned for 2 weeks.

No matter how much you say them stealing all your stuff doesn’t bother you, I know it does. It would both anybody. Until Moparisthebest comes on and checks the server logs a 2 week ban is off the table. We need to be helping our playerbase grow, and to do that we need to avoid conflicts such as these.

Also, the next time you ban somebody please don’t use /ban ingame but instead use the forum function that was added:

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=moderate;area=viewgroups;sa=members;group=86

It’s a lot more convenient for the other staff members :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Tarkoff, post:3, topic:446469”]The ban is for the rules that were broken. Had nothing to do with me being mad, I told them every reason they wer banned I would have done it jsut the same if it wasent me that was looted.
Its only for 2 weeks. I wanted to make it a few months.

This post is for the issue how or why the res was faulted. not for their ban.[/quote]Your not going get anywhere with how the res was ‘faulted’ without mitb and he’s very busy apparently. What rules did they break? One caused minimal damage to your place and offered to fix it and you banned him.

Read full topic

item.title: Res Issue
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

They don’t really deserve to be banned, we are going to have to wait for Moparisthebest to look into it before anything can be proven as far as exploits go. I understand your frustration however I’ve lost all my stuff twice due to bugs/exploits.

Read full topic
